The Delectable Dairy Milk Chocolate Taste You Love, With a Citrusy Twist!

entry.title: Cadbury Dairy Milk Tiffin Bar UK - 53g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 4.19

Cadbury Dairy Milk from the UK

This classic old-fashioned Cadbury Chocolate Bar is back! Remember the delicious medley of crunchy biscuit and juicy raisins, smothered in smooth creamy Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate that we all love!

  • Made in Ireland
  • Suitable for Vegetarians

53g

Ingredients:

Milk**, Sugar, Dried Grapes, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Vegetable Fats (Palm, Shea), Wheat Flour, Emulsifiers (E442, E476), Salt, Raising Agents (Sodium Bicarbonate, Ammonium Bicarbonate), Flavourings, **The equivalent of 426ml of Fresh Liquid Milk in every 227g of Milk Chocolate, Milk Chocolate: Milk Solids 20% minimum, actual 23%, Cocoa Solids 20% minimum, Contains Vegetable Fats in addition to Cocoa Butter

entry.title: Cadbury Twirl Orange UK - 43g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.29

Give this Twirl a Whirl!

Retro Candy -1970's

Looking for an intense chocolate hit? Try the Limited Edition Cadbury Twirl Orange chocolate bar that offers twice the pleasure, with two delicious milk chocolate fingers infused with an orange hit. These two flake-style bars were originally introduced in the 1970s as a solo bar, but repackaged in 1984 as a twin, since 2 are better than 1! Let it melt in your mouth as the twirling ribbons unfold. Perfect for indulging. 

43g

entry.title: Cadbury High Lights Low Sugar Hot Chocolate Mix - 154g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Snacks
Price: 9.79

Get Cozy with Cadbury Hot Chocolate!

Cadbury Highlights

Low Sugar Cocoa Drink Mix

Time to put your jammies on, get cozy, and warm up during this chilly winter season with Cadbury's Highlights Hot Chocolate. 

A magnificently smooth and delectably hearty cocoa drink. Best prepared with hot milk, for a creamy luscious chocolate beverage and definitive comfortable hot chocolate experience.

With only 38 calories per serving and a low sugar content, this is a truly decadent hot chocolate drink that everyone will love!

154g

Fresh Cadbury Treats Shipped to Canada & the USA!

Ingredients

Sugar, cocoa powder, acidity regulator (potassium carbonates), flavouring. May contain milk. 25% minimum cocoa solids.

Cadbury Chocolate 

Imported from the UK

Cadbury's chocolate has been a British favourite since its launch in 1948. 

Dive into sweet heavens with this Cadbury Shortcake Snack.
Be delighted by four squares of delicious shortcake biscuit, enrobed in silky smooth Cadbury milk chocolate for a perfect chocolatey bite!

Delicious crunchy shortcake biscuits with Cadbury milk chocolate make it the perfect snack.

  • Vegetarian 
  • 102 calories per 2 biscuits

Check out our extensive collection of Cadbury chocolates!

Click here to see all of our British treats & sweets! 

Ingredients

WHEAT flour (with added calcium, iron, niacin and thiamin), sugar, vegetable fats (palm, sal, shea), MILK, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, dextrose, rapeseed oil, dried whey (from MILK), molasses, partially inverted sugar syrup, salt, emulsifiers (SOYA lecithin, E476), raising agents (ammonium bicarbonate, sodium bicarbonate), flavourings.
MAY CONTAIN NUTS.

One 40g chocolate bar

entry.title: Cadbury Oreo Instant Hot Chocolate Mix - 260g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 9.99

Cadbury + Oreo = Epic

Enjoy two epic brands as a traditional hot chocolate drink. Cadbury Oreo Instant Hot Chocolate will certainly delight your tastebuds. Add hot water or hot milk to create this wonderful treat. The intense chocolate of Cadbury with the milk vanilla flavours of Oreo is a sweet combination that you will enjoy immensely!

260 g

Ingredients:

Sugar, strongly reduced cocoa powder (17%), glucose syrup, palm oil, skimmed milk powder, milk chocolate (3%) [ milk, sugar, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, vegetable fats (palm, shea), emulsifier (E442), flavourings], whey powder (made from milk ), Flavors, thickeners (carrageenan), salt, milk protein, anti-caking agent (E551), colour (E153), emulsifier (E471), stabilizer (E339). 
Store in a cool and dry place. 

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.
